LanguageData.Bullet_EMTurretDart.label: dart
LanguageData.EMTurretDart.label: dart trap
LanguageData.EMTurretDart.description: A rudimentary dart trap possessed of some limited intelligence through manipulation of mechanites. Hard to hit a single target with but great for crowds and area denial.
LanguageData.EMTurretDartX.label: dart sentry
LanguageData.EMTurretDartX.description: More advanced form of the dart trap, with quicker loaders and more aerodynamic arrows. Hard to hit a single target with but great for crowds and area denial.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDart.label: dart trap
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDart.description: Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDart.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: dart trap
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDartX.label: dart sentry
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDartX.description: Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretDartX.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: dart sentry
